title: Consent Pending to Disclosure/Review Consent
custom_preconds: As a BIGS admin, I want the ability to track the progress of personnel from Consent Pending to Disclosure/Review Consent so that I can continue the background check process.
custom_steps:
Dev is checking the following fields to check if a person moves to “Disclosure/Review Consent”

disclosure in Arrest History (if applicable)

disclosure in Pending Charges (if applicable)

disclosure in conviction history (if applicable)

Other names known under

Lived in any other country (Yes/No)
custom_expected:
If personnel has disclosed information on their consent form, personnel status will go from Consent Pending to Disclosure/Review Consent

Status Column in the activity table for this personnel will display "Disclosure/Review Consent

Description Column in the activity table for this personnel will display "Personnel disclosure."

title: Disclosure/Review Consent to Pending BOC
custom_preconds: At times, personnel upon completing their consent form may disclose information that requires a BIGS admin to review before allowing them to move to the next status. Upon review, if there is any feedback from the BIGS admin, the BIGS admin will move them back to Pending BOC for more information before continuing the background check process.
custom_steps:
If personnel discloses information on their consent form, personnel will be listed in the Disclosure/Review Consent until a BIGS Admin has had time to review.

Once a BIGS Admin has reviewed and determines they need more information from personnel, the BIGS admin will select Resubmit from the 3 dot menu and personnel will move back to Pending BOC

Status Column for Personnel in the activity table will display "Pending BOC."

Description Column for Personnel in the activity table will display "BIGS Admin reviewed-resubmitted to Pending BOC.”
custom_expected:
AC1) If a user clicks on the 3 dot menu, then BIGS admin is able to select Resubmit
AC2) If a user selects Resubmit from the 3 dot menu, then personnel is sent back to the Pending BOC status 
AC3) If a user is viewing the personnel activity table in the Personnel profile, the status column displays "Pending BOC.”
AC4) If a user is viewing the personnel activity table in the Personnel profile, the description column displays "BIGS Admin reviewed-resubmitted to Pending BOC.”

title: Reviewed but Not Submitted to In Progress
